changeSet.author: slawomirbankowski

createTable.remarks: host on which executor can execute
DICTIONARY - type of executor to run algorithms on
Storage assigned to executor
Snapshot of checking storage views for storage
Storage assigned to executor
DICTIONARY - Type of source: JDBC, FTP, SHARED FOLDER
Instance of a source to get data from
DICTIONARY - all parameters needed to define source instance
DICTIONARY - mapping between source type like FTP or JDBC and parameters
value of param for given source instance
DICTIONARY - type of view: FTP, file in FTP, table or view in database, method in WebService
view in the source - could be folder in FTP, file in FTP, table or view in database, method in WebService
column in the view - update/refresh while downloading source to storage
schedule to download source view to local storage
run of source and download data to local/global storage - this is process only
statistics for downloaded view
statistics for downloaded view
DICTIONARY - algorithm connected with reason to build it, general class with input columns and output columns for results
DICTIONARY - version of algorithm, each version can have different (new) parameters and columns
DICTIONARY - implementation of algorithm version for given type of executor
DICTIONARY - parameter needed to run algorithm
DICTIONARY - parameter needed to run algorithm
DICTIONARY - type of column to be used for ML algorithm
DICTIONARY - mapping between algorithm type like Prediction or Classification and column type to be mapped from downloaded data
DICTIONARY - type of schedule of algorithm
schedule of run algorithm for given instance and parameters on given executor
DICTIONARY - type of view for schedule - PRIMARY, TRAINING, TESTING, VALIDATION
connection between schedule of algorithm run and source view to be used
view column downloaded from source mapped for schedule to algorithm input column
DICTIONARY - type of run for algorithm: NORMAL, SPECULATIVE, RERUN
run of algorithm for given schedule that contains instance of algorithm, storage and downloaded view
view downloaded for algorithm run
DICTIONARY - type of output
DICTIONARY - mapping between type of algorithm and type of output
schedule of run algorithm for given instance and parameters on given executor

changeSet.createView: select _algorithmImplementation.algorithmImplementationId, _algorithmImplementation.insertedRowDate, _algorithmImplementation.algorithmTypeVersionId, _algorithmImplementation.executorTypeId, _algorithmImplementation.algorithmImplementationName, _algorithmImplementation.algorithmImplementationClass , _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionId , _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeId , _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionName as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionName , _algorithmTypeVersion.insertedRowDate as algorithmTypeVersion_insertedRowDate , _executorType.executorTypeId as executorType_executorTypeId , _executorType.insertedRowDate as executorType_insertedRowDate , _executorType.executorTypeName as executorType_executorTypeName , _executorType.executorTypeClass as executorType_executorTypeClass from algorithmImplementation _algorithmImplementation join algorithmTypeVersion _algorithmTypeVersion on _algorithmImplementation.algorithmTypeVersionId = _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionId join executorType _executorType on _algorithmImplementation.executorTypeId = _executorType.executorTypeId;

select _algorithmParamType.algorithmParamId, _algorithmParamType.algorithmTypeId, _algorithmParamType.algorithmTypeVersionId, _algorithmParamType.insertedRowDate , _algorithmParam.algorithmParamId as algorithmParam_algorithmParamId , _algorithmParam.insertedRowDate as algorithmParam_insertedRowDate , _algorithmParam.algorithmParamName as algorithmParam_algorithmParamName , _algorithmParam.algorithmParamDescription as algorithmParam_algorithmParamDescription , _algorithmParam.algorithmParamType as algorithmParam_algorithmParamType , _algorithmType.algorithmTypeId as algorithmType_algorithmTypeId , _algorithmType.algorithmTypeName as algorithmType_algorithmTypeName , _algorithmType.algorithmTypeDescription as algorithmType_algorithmTypeDescription , _algorithmType.insertedRowDate as algorithmType_insertedRowDate , _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionId , _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeId , _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionName as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionName , _algorithmTypeVersion.insertedRowDate as algorithmTypeVersion_insertedRowDate from algorithmParamType _algorithmParamType join algorithmParam _algorithmParam on _algorithmParamType.algorithmParamId = _algorithmParam.algorithmParamId join algorithmType _algorithmType on _algorithmParamType.algorithmTypeId = _algorithmType.algorithmTypeId join algorithmTypeVersion _algorithmTypeVersion on _algorithmParamType.algorithmTypeVersionId = _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionId;

select _algorithmRun.algorithmRunId, _algorithmRun.algorithmScheduleId, _algorithmRun.executorInstanceId, _algorithmRun.executorStorageId, _algorithmRun.algorithmRunName, _algorithmRun.insertedRowDate, _algorithmRun.runDate, _algorithmRun.isRunning, _algorithmRun.isFinished , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmImplementationId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleTypeId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleName as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleName , _algorithmSchedule.isScheduled as algorithmSchedule_isScheduled , _algorithmSchedule.insertedRowDate as algorithmSchedule_insertedRowDate , _executorInstance.executorInstanceId as executorInstance_executorInstanceId , _executorInstance.executorTypeId as executorInstance_executorTypeId , _executorInstance.executorHostId as executorInstance_executorHostId , _executorInstance.executorInstanceName as executorInstance_executorInstanceName , _executorInstance.isRunning as executorInstance_isRunning , _executorInstance.isFinished as executorInstance_isFinished , _executorInstance.portNumber as executorInstance_portNumber , _executorInstance.insertedRowDate as executorInstance_insertedRowDate , _executorInstance.guid as executorInstance_guid , _executorInstance.endDate as executorInstance_endDate , _executorStorage.executorStorageId as executorStorage_executorStorageId , _executorStorage.executorHostId as executorStorage_executorHostId , _executorStorage.executorStorageTypeId as executorStorage_executorStorageTypeId , _executorStorage.storageDefinition as executorStorage_storageDefinition , _executorStorage.storageBasePath as executorStorage_storageBasePath , _executorStorage.storageFulllPath as executorStorage_storageFulllPath , _executorStorage.isRunning as executorStorage_isRunning , _executorStorage.portNumber as executorStorage_portNumber , _executorStorage.insertedRowDate as executorStorage_insertedRowDate , _executorStorage.guid as executorStorage_guid from algorithmRun _algorithmRun join algorithmSchedule _algorithmSchedule on _algorithmRun.algorithmScheduleId = _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleId join executorInstance _executorInstance on _algorithmRun.executorInstanceId = _executorInstance.executorInstanceId join executorStorage _executorStorage on _algorithmRun.executorStorageId = _executorStorage.executorStorageId;

select _algorithmRunView.algorithmRunViewId, _algorithmRunView.algorithmRunId, _algorithmRunView.executorStorageViewId, _algorithmRunView.insertedRowDate, _algorithmRunView.isDownloaded , _algorithmRun.algorithmRunId as algorithmRun_algorithmRunId , _algorithmRun.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmRun_algorithmScheduleId , _algorithmRun.executorInstanceId as algorithmRun_executorInstanceId , _algorithmRun.executorStorageId as algorithmRun_executorStorageId , _algorithmRun.algorithmRunName as algorithmRun_algorithmRunName , _algorithmRun.insertedRowDate as algorithmRun_insertedRowDate , _algorithmRun.runDate as algorithmRun_runDate , _algorithmRun.isRunning as algorithmRun_isRunning , _algorithmRun.isFinished as algorithmRun_isFinished , _executorStorageView.executorStorageViewId as executorStorageView_executorStorageViewId , _executorStorageView.insertedRowDate as executorStorageView_insertedRowDate , _executorStorageView.executorStorageSnapshotId as executorStorageView_executorStorageSnapshotId , _executorStorageView.executorStorageId as executorStorageView_executorStorageId , _executorStorageView.sourceDownloadId as executorStorageView_sourceDownloadId , _executorStorageView.storagePath as executorStorageView_storagePath , _executorStorageView.viewSize as executorStorageView_viewSize , _executorStorageView.viewRowsCount as executorStorageView_viewRowsCount from algorithmRunView _algorithmRunView join algorithmRun _algorithmRun on _algorithmRunView.algorithmRunId = _algorithmRun.algorithmRunId join executorStorageView _executorStorageView on _algorithmRunView.executorStorageViewId = _executorStorageView.executorStorageViewId;

select _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleId, _algorithmSchedule.algorithmImplementationId, _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleTypeId, _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleName, _algorithmSchedule.isScheduled, _algorithmSchedule.insertedRowDate , _algorithmImplementation.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmImplementation_algorithmImplementationId , _algorithmImplementation.insertedRowDate as algorithmImplementation_insertedRowDate , _algorithmImplementation.algorithmTypeVersionId as algorithmImplementation_algorithmTypeVersionId , _algorithmImplementation.executorTypeId as algorithmImplementation_executorTypeId , _algorithmImplementation.algorithmImplementationName as algorithmImplementation_algorithmImplementationName , _algorithmImplementation.algorithmImplementationClass as algorithmImplementation_algorithmImplementationClass , _algorithmScheduleType.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmScheduleType_algorithmScheduleTypeId , _algorithmScheduleType.algorithmScheduleTypeName as algorithmScheduleType_algorithmScheduleTypeName , _algorithmScheduleType.insertedRowDate as algorithmScheduleType_insertedRowDate from algorithmSchedule _algorithmSchedule join algorithmImplementation _algorithmImplementation on _algorithmSchedule.algorithmImplementationId = _algorithmImplementation.algorithmImplementationId join algorithmScheduleType _algorithmScheduleType on _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleTypeId = _algorithmScheduleType.algorithmScheduleTypeId;

select _algorithmScheduleColumn.algorithmScheduleColumnId, _algorithmScheduleColumn.algorithmScheduleId, _algorithmScheduleColumn.algorithmColumnTypeId, _algorithmScheduleColumn.algorithmScheduleViewId, _algorithmScheduleColumn.sourceViewId, _algorithmScheduleColumn.sourceViewColumnId, _algorithmScheduleColumn.extendedProperties, _algorithmScheduleColumn.insertedRowDate , _algorithmColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeId as algorithmColumnType_algorithmColumnTypeId , _algorithmColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeName as algorithmColumnType_algorithmColumnTypeName , _algorithmColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeDescription as algorithmColumnType_algorithmColumnTypeDescription , _algorithmColumnType.insertedRowDate as algorithmColumnType_insertedRowDate , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmImplementationId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleTypeId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleName as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleName , _algorithmSchedule.isScheduled as algorithmSchedule_isScheduled , _algorithmSchedule.insertedRowDate as algorithmSchedule_insertedRowDate , _algorithmScheduleView.algorithmScheduleViewId as algorithmScheduleView_algorithmScheduleViewId , _algorithmScheduleView.algorithmScheduleViewTypeId as algorithmScheduleView_algorithmScheduleViewTypeId , _algorithmScheduleView.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmScheduleView_algorithmScheduleId , _algorithmScheduleView.sourceViewId as algorithmScheduleView_sourceViewId , _algorithmScheduleView.insertedRowDate as algorithmScheduleView_insertedRowDate , _algorithmScheduleView.joinOnDefinition as algorithmScheduleView_joinOnDefinition , _sourceView.sourceViewId as sourceView_sourceViewId , _sourceView.sourceInstanceId as sourceView_sourceInstanceId , _sourceView.sourceViewTypeId as sourceView_sourceViewTypeId , _sourceView.sourceViewName as sourceView_sourceViewName , _sourceView.sourceViewDefinition as sourceView_sourceViewDefinition , _sourceView.insertedRowDate as sourceView_insertedRowDate , _sourceViewColumn.sourceViewColumnId as sourceViewColumn_sourceViewColumnId , _sourceViewColumn.sourceViewId as sourceViewColumn_sourceViewId , _sourceViewColumn.insertedRowDate as sourceViewColumn_insertedRowDate , _sourceViewColumn.guid as sourceViewColumn_guid , _sourceViewColumn.columnName as sourceViewColumn_columnName , _sourceViewColumn.columnType as sourceViewColumn_columnType from algorithmScheduleColumn _algorithmScheduleColumn join algorithmColumnType _algorithmColumnType on _algorithmScheduleColumn.algorithmColumnTypeId = _algorithmColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeId join algorithmSchedule _algorithmSchedule on _algorithmScheduleColumn.algorithmScheduleId = _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleId join algorithmScheduleView _algorithmScheduleView on _algorithmScheduleColumn.algorithmScheduleViewId = _algorithmScheduleView.algorithmScheduleViewId join sourceView _sourceView on _algorithmScheduleColumn.sourceViewId = _sourceView.sourceViewId join sourceViewColumn _sourceViewColumn on _algorithmScheduleColumn.sourceViewColumnId = _sourceViewColumn.sourceViewColumnId;

select _algorithmScheduleParam.algorithmScheduleParamId, _algorithmScheduleParam.algorithmScheduleId, _algorithmScheduleParam.algorithmParamId, _algorithmScheduleParam.algorithmParamValue, _algorithmScheduleParam.insertedRowDate , _algorithmParam.algorithmParamId as algorithmParam_algorithmParamId , _algorithmParam.insertedRowDate as algorithmParam_insertedRowDate , _algorithmParam.algorithmParamName as algorithmParam_algorithmParamName , _algorithmParam.algorithmParamDescription as algorithmParam_algorithmParamDescription , _algorithmParam.algorithmParamType as algorithmParam_algorithmParamType , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmImplementationId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleTypeId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleName as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleName , _algorithmSchedule.isScheduled as algorithmSchedule_isScheduled , _algorithmSchedule.insertedRowDate as algorithmSchedule_insertedRowDate from algorithmScheduleParam _algorithmScheduleParam join algorithmParam _algorithmParam on _algorithmScheduleParam.algorithmParamId = _algorithmParam.algorithmParamId join algorithmSchedule _algorithmSchedule on _algorithmScheduleParam.algorithmScheduleId = _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleId;

select _algorithmScheduleView.algorithmScheduleViewId, _algorithmScheduleView.algorithmScheduleViewTypeId, _algorithmScheduleView.algorithmScheduleId, _algorithmScheduleView.sourceViewId, _algorithmScheduleView.insertedRowDate, _algorithmScheduleView.joinOnDefinition , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmImplementationId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleTypeId , _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleName as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleName , _algorithmSchedule.isScheduled as algorithmSchedule_isScheduled , _algorithmSchedule.insertedRowDate as algorithmSchedule_insertedRowDate , _algorithmScheduleViewType.algorithmScheduleViewTypeId as algorithmScheduleViewType_algorithmScheduleViewTypeId , _algorithmScheduleViewType.algorithmScheduleViewTypeName as algorithmScheduleViewType_algorithmScheduleViewTypeName , _algorithmScheduleViewType.insertedRowDate as algorithmScheduleViewType_insertedRowDate , _sourceView.sourceViewId as sourceView_sourceViewId , _sourceView.sourceInstanceId as sourceView_sourceInstanceId , _sourceView.sourceViewTypeId as sourceView_sourceViewTypeId , _sourceView.sourceViewName as sourceView_sourceViewName , _sourceView.sourceViewDefinition as sourceView_sourceViewDefinition , _sourceView.insertedRowDate as sourceView_insertedRowDate from algorithmScheduleView _algorithmScheduleView join algorithmSchedule _algorithmSchedule on _algorithmScheduleView.algorithmScheduleId = _algorithmSchedule.algorithmScheduleId join algorithmScheduleViewType _algorithmScheduleViewType on _algorithmScheduleView.algorithmScheduleViewTypeId = _algorithmScheduleViewType.algorithmScheduleViewTypeId join sourceView _sourceView on _algorithmScheduleView.sourceViewId = _sourceView.sourceViewId;

select _algorithmTypeColumnType.algorithmTypeVersionId, _algorithmTypeColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeId, _algorithmTypeColumnType.allowMultiple, _algorithmTypeColumnType.allowEmpty, _algorithmTypeColumnType.insertedRowDate , _algorithmColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeId as algorithmColumnType_algorithmColumnTypeId , _algorithmColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeName as algorithmColumnType_algorithmColumnTypeName , _algorithmColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeDescription as algorithmColumnType_algorithmColumnTypeDescription , _algorithmColumnType.insertedRowDate as algorithmColumnType_insertedRowDate , _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionId , _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeId , _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionName as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionName , _algorithmTypeVersion.insertedRowDate as algorithmTypeVersion_insertedRowDate from algorithmTypeColumnType _algorithmTypeColumnType join algorithmColumnType _algorithmColumnType on _algorithmTypeColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeId = _algorithmColumnType.algorithmColumnTypeId join algorithmTypeVersion _algorithmTypeVersion on _algorithmTypeColumnType.algorithmTypeVersionId = _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionId;

select _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionId, _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeId, _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeVersionName, _algorithmTypeVersion.insertedRowDate , _algorithmType.algorithmTypeId as algorithmType_algorithmTypeId , _algorithmType.algorithmTypeName as algorithmType_algorithmTypeName , _algorithmType.algorithmTypeDescription as algorithmType_algorithmTypeDescription , _algorithmType.insertedRowDate as algorithmType_insertedRowDate from algorithmTypeVersion _algorithmTypeVersion join algorithmType _algorithmType on _algorithmTypeVersion.algorithmTypeId = _algorithmType.algorithmTypeId;

select _executorInstance.executorInstanceId, _executorInstance.executorTypeId, _executorInstance.executorHostId, _executorInstance.executorInstanceName, _executorInstance.isRunning, _executorInstance.isFinished, _executorInstance.portNumber, _executorInstance.insertedRowDate, _executorInstance.guid, _executorInstance.endDate , _executorHost.executorHostId as executorHost_executorHostId , _executorHost.insertedRowDate as executorHost_insertedRowDate , _executorHost.hostName as executorHost_hostName , _executorHost.hostIp as executorHost_hostIp , _executorHost.hostDomain as executorHost_hostDomain , _executorHost.hostOsType as executorHost_hostOsType , _executorHost.hostOsVersion as executorHost_hostOsVersion , _executorHost.isWorking as executorHost_isWorking , _executorType.executorTypeId as executorType_executorTypeId , _executorType.insertedRowDate as executorType_insertedRowDate , _executorType.executorTypeName as executorType_executorTypeName , _executorType.executorTypeClass as executorType_executorTypeClass from executorInstance _executorInstance join executorHost _executorHost on _executorInstance.executorHostId = _executorHost.executorHostId join executorType _executorType on _executorInstance.executorTypeId = _executorType.executorTypeId;

select _executorRest.executorRestId, _executorRest.executorHostId, _executorRest.insertedRowDate, _executorRest.restPort, _executorRest.restVersion, _executorRest.restStatus , _executorHost.executorHostId as executorHost_executorHostId , _executorHost.insertedRowDate as executorHost_insertedRowDate , _executorHost.hostName as executorHost_hostName , _executorHost.hostIp as executorHost_hostIp , _executorHost.hostDomain as executorHost_hostDomain , _executorHost.hostOsType as executorHost_hostOsType , _executorHost.hostOsVersion as executorHost_hostOsVersion , _executorHost.isWorking as executorHost_isWorking from executorRest _executorRest join executorHost _executorHost on _executorRest.executorHostId = _executorHost.executorHostId;

select _executorRestCall.executorRestCallId, _executorRestCall.insertedRowDate, _executorRestCall.executorHostId, _executorRestCall.executorRestId, _executorRestCall.requestMethod, _executorRestCall.requestHeader, _executorRestCall.requestBody, _executorRestCall.responseBody , _executorHost.executorHostId as executorHost_executorHostId , _executorHost.insertedRowDate as executorHost_insertedRowDate , _executorHost.hostName as executorHost_hostName , _executorHost.hostIp as executorHost_hostIp , _executorHost.hostDomain as executorHost_hostDomain , _executorHost.hostOsType as executorHost_hostOsType , _executorHost.hostOsVersion as executorHost_hostOsVersion , _executorHost.isWorking as executorHost_isWorking , _executorRest.executorRestId as executorRest_executorRestId , _executorRest.executorHostId as executorRest_executorHostId , _executorRest.insertedRowDate as executorRest_insertedRowDate , _executorRest.restPort as executorRest_restPort , _executorRest.restVersion as executorRest_restVersion , _executorRest.restStatus as executorRest_restStatus from executorRestCall _executorRestCall join executorHost _executorHost on _executorRestCall.executorHostId = _executorHost.executorHostId join executorRest _executorRest on _executorRestCall.executorRestId = _executorRest.executorRestId;

select _executorStorage.executorStorageId, _executorStorage.executorHostId, _executorStorage.executorStorageTypeId, _executorStorage.storageDefinition, _executorStorage.storageBasePath, _executorStorage.storageFulllPath, _executorStorage.isRunning, _executorStorage.portNumber, _executorStorage.insertedRowDate, _executorStorage.guid , _executorStorageType.executorStorageTypeId as executorStorageType_executorStorageTypeId , _executorStorageType.insertedRowDate as executorStorageType_insertedRowDate , _executorStorageType.executorStorageTypeName as executorStorageType_executorStorageTypeName , _executorStorageType.executorStorageTypeClass as executorStorageType_executorStorageTypeClass , _executorHost.executorHostId as executorHost_executorHostId , _executorHost.insertedRowDate as executorHost_insertedRowDate , _executorHost.hostName as executorHost_hostName , _executorHost.hostIp as executorHost_hostIp , _executorHost.hostDomain as executorHost_hostDomain , _executorHost.hostOsType as executorHost_hostOsType , _executorHost.hostOsVersion as executorHost_hostOsVersion , _executorHost.isWorking as executorHost_isWorking from executorStorage _executorStorage join executorStorageType _executorStorageType on _executorStorage.executorStorageTypeId = _executorStorageType.executorStorageTypeId join executorHost _executorHost on _executorStorage.executorHostId = _executorHost.executorHostId;

select _executorStorageSnapshot.executorStorageSnapshotId, _executorStorageSnapshot.executorInstanceId, _executorStorageSnapshot.insertedRowDate , _executorInstance.executorInstanceId as executorInstance_executorInstanceId , _executorInstance.executorTypeId as executorInstance_executorTypeId , _executorInstance.executorHostId as executorInstance_executorHostId , _executorInstance.executorInstanceName as executorInstance_executorInstanceName , _executorInstance.isRunning as executorInstance_isRunning , _executorInstance.isFinished as executorInstance_isFinished , _executorInstance.portNumber as executorInstance_portNumber , _executorInstance.insertedRowDate as executorInstance_insertedRowDate , _executorInstance.guid as executorInstance_guid , _executorInstance.endDate as executorInstance_endDate from executorStorageSnapshot _executorStorageSnapshot join executorInstance _executorInstance on _executorStorageSnapshot.executorInstanceId = _executorInstance.executorInstanceId;

select _executorStorageView.executorStorageViewId, _executorStorageView.insertedRowDate, _executorStorageView.executorStorageSnapshotId, _executorStorageView.executorStorageId, _executorStorageView.sourceDownloadId, _executorStorageView.storagePath, _executorStorageView.viewSize, _executorStorageView.viewRowsCount , _executorStorage.executorStorageId as executorStorage_executorStorageId , _executorStorage.executorHostId as executorStorage_executorHostId , _executorStorage.executorStorageTypeId as executorStorage_executorStorageTypeId , _executorStorage.storageDefinition as executorStorage_storageDefinition , _executorStorage.storageBasePath as executorStorage_storageBasePath , _executorStorage.storageFulllPath as executorStorage_storageFulllPath , _executorStorage.isRunning as executorStorage_isRunning , _executorStorage.portNumber as executorStorage_portNumber , _executorStorage.insertedRowDate as executorStorage_insertedRowDate , _executorStorage.guid as executorStorage_guid from executorStorageView _executorStorageView join executorStorage _executorStorage on _executorStorageView.executorStorageId = _executorStorage.executorStorageId;

select _resourceManager.resourceManagerId, _resourceManager.resourceManagerTypeId, _resourceManager.executorHostId, _resourceManager.resourceManagerStatus, _resourceManager.insertedRowDate , _executorHost.executorHostId as executorHost_executorHostId , _executorHost.insertedRowDate as executorHost_insertedRowDate , _executorHost.hostName as executorHost_hostName , _executorHost.hostIp as executorHost_hostIp , _executorHost.hostDomain as executorHost_hostDomain , _executorHost.hostOsType as executorHost_hostOsType , _executorHost.hostOsVersion as executorHost_hostOsVersion , _executorHost.isWorking as executorHost_isWorking , _resourceManagerType.resourceManagerTypeId as resourceManagerType_resourceManagerTypeId , _resourceManagerType.resourceManagerTypeName as resourceManagerType_resourceManagerTypeName , _resourceManagerType.resourceManagerTypeClass as resourceManagerType_resourceManagerTypeClass , _resourceManagerType.insertedRowDate as resourceManagerType_insertedRowDate from resourceManager _resourceManager join executorHost _executorHost on _resourceManager.executorHostId = _executorHost.executorHostId join resourceManagerType _resourceManagerType on _resourceManager.resourceManagerTypeId = _resourceManagerType.resourceManagerTypeId;

select _resourceManagerMeasure.resourceManagerMeasureId, _resourceManagerMeasure.resourceManagerId, _resourceManagerMeasure.resourceMeasureId, _resourceManagerMeasure.measureString, _resourceManagerMeasure.measureValue, _resourceManagerMeasure.insertedRowDate , _resourceManager.resourceManagerId as resourceManager_resourceManagerId , _resourceManager.resourceManagerTypeId as resourceManager_resourceManagerTypeId , _resourceManager.executorHostId as resourceManager_executorHostId , _resourceManager.resourceManagerStatus as resourceManager_resourceManagerStatus , _resourceManager.insertedRowDate as resourceManager_insertedRowDate , _resourceMeasure.resourceMeasureId as resourceMeasure_resourceMeasureId , _resourceMeasure.resourceMeasureName as resourceMeasure_resourceMeasureName , _resourceMeasure.insertedRowDate as resourceMeasure_insertedRowDate from resourceManagerMeasure _resourceManagerMeasure join resourceManager _resourceManager on _resourceManagerMeasure.resourceManagerId = _resourceManager.resourceManagerId join resourceMeasure _resourceMeasure on _resourceManagerMeasure.resourceMeasureId = _resourceMeasure.resourceMeasureId;

select _sourceDownload.sourceDownloadId, _sourceDownload.sourceScheduleId, _sourceDownload.insertedRowDate, _sourceDownload.lastUpdatedDate, _sourceDownload.retryNumber, _sourceDownload.isRunning, _sourceDownload.isFinished, _sourceDownload.isExcecption, _sourceDownload.excecptionDescription , _sourceSchedule.sourceScheduleId as sourceSchedule_sourceScheduleId , _sourceSchedule.sourceViewId as sourceSchedule_sourceViewId , _sourceSchedule.executorStorageId as sourceSchedule_executorStorageId , _sourceSchedule.insertedRowDate as sourceSchedule_insertedRowDate , _sourceSchedule.guid as sourceSchedule_guid , _sourceSchedule.onDemand as sourceSchedule_onDemand , _sourceSchedule.startTime as sourceSchedule_startTime , _sourceSchedule.intervalValue as sourceSchedule_intervalValue from sourceDownload _sourceDownload join sourceSchedule _sourceSchedule on _sourceDownload.sourceScheduleId = _sourceSchedule.sourceScheduleId;

select _sourceDownloadStat.sourceDownloadStatId, _sourceDownloadStat.sourceDownloadId, _sourceDownloadStat.insertedRowDate, _sourceDownloadStat.rowsCount, _sourceDownloadStat.errorRowsCount, _sourceDownloadStat.totalBytesCount, _sourceDownloadStat.empryRowsCount , _sourceDownload.sourceDownloadId as sourceDownload_sourceDownloadId , _sourceDownload.sourceScheduleId as sourceDownload_sourceScheduleId , _sourceDownload.insertedRowDate as sourceDownload_insertedRowDate , _sourceDownload.lastUpdatedDate as sourceDownload_lastUpdatedDate , _sourceDownload.retryNumber as sourceDownload_retryNumber , _sourceDownload.isRunning as sourceDownload_isRunning , _sourceDownload.isFinished as sourceDownload_isFinished , _sourceDownload.isExcecption as sourceDownload_isExcecption , _sourceDownload.excecptionDescription as sourceDownload_excecptionDescription from sourceDownloadStat _sourceDownloadStat join sourceDownload _sourceDownload on _sourceDownloadStat.sourceDownloadId = _sourceDownload.sourceDownloadId;

select _sourceDownloadStatColumn.sourceDownloadStatColumnId, _sourceDownloadStatColumn.sourceDownloadId, _sourceDownloadStatColumn.sourceViewColumnId, _sourceDownloadStatColumn.insertedRowDate, _sourceDownloadStatColumn.columnMinNumber, _sourceDownloadStatColumn.columnMaxNumber, _sourceDownloadStatColumn.columnMinStr, _sourceDownloadStatColumn.columnMaxStr, _sourceDownloadStatColumn.columnNonemptyCount , _sourceDownload.sourceDownloadId as sourceDownload_sourceDownloadId , _sourceDownload.sourceScheduleId as sourceDownload_sourceScheduleId , _sourceDownload.insertedRowDate as sourceDownload_insertedRowDate , _sourceDownload.lastUpdatedDate as sourceDownload_lastUpdatedDate , _sourceDownload.retryNumber as sourceDownload_retryNumber , _sourceDownload.isRunning as sourceDownload_isRunning , _sourceDownload.isFinished as sourceDownload_isFinished , _sourceDownload.isExcecption as sourceDownload_isExcecption , _sourceDownload.excecptionDescription as sourceDownload_excecptionDescription , _sourceViewColumn.sourceViewColumnId as sourceViewColumn_sourceViewColumnId , _sourceViewColumn.sourceViewId as sourceViewColumn_sourceViewId , _sourceViewColumn.insertedRowDate as sourceViewColumn_insertedRowDate , _sourceViewColumn.guid as sourceViewColumn_guid , _sourceViewColumn.columnName as sourceViewColumn_columnName , _sourceViewColumn.columnType as sourceViewColumn_columnType from sourceDownloadStatColumn _sourceDownloadStatColumn join sourceDownload _sourceDownload on _sourceDownloadStatColumn.sourceDownloadId = _sourceDownload.sourceDownloadId join sourceViewColumn _sourceViewColumn on _sourceDownloadStatColumn.sourceViewColumnId = _sourceViewColumn.sourceViewColumnId;

select _sourceInstance.sourceInstanceId, _sourceInstance.sourceTypeId, _sourceInstance.sourceInstanceName, _sourceInstance.errorCount, _sourceInstance.correctCount, _sourceInstance.lastStatus, _sourceInstance.lastConnectionDate, _sourceInstance.insertedRowDate , _sourceType.sourceTypeId as sourceType_sourceTypeId , _sourceType.sourceTypeName as sourceType_sourceTypeName , _sourceType.sourceTypeClass as sourceType_sourceTypeClass , _sourceType.insertedRowDate as sourceType_insertedRowDate from sourceInstance _sourceInstance join sourceType _sourceType on _sourceInstance.sourceTypeId = _sourceType.sourceTypeId;

select _sourceParamValue.sourceInstanceId, _sourceParamValue.sourceParamId, _sourceParamValue.sourceParamValueId, _sourceParamValue.sourceParamValueVersion, _sourceParamValue.insertedRowDate, _sourceParamValue.paramValue , _sourceInstance.sourceInstanceId as sourceInstance_sourceInstanceId , _sourceInstance.sourceTypeId as sourceInstance_sourceTypeId , _sourceInstance.sourceInstanceName as sourceInstance_sourceInstanceName , _sourceInstance.errorCount as sourceInstance_errorCount , _sourceInstance.correctCount as sourceInstance_correctCount , _sourceInstance.lastStatus as sourceInstance_lastStatus , _sourceInstance.lastConnectionDate as sourceInstance_lastConnectionDate , _sourceInstance.insertedRowDate as sourceInstance_insertedRowDate , _sourceParam.sourceParamId as sourceParam_sourceParamId , _sourceParam.sourceParamName as sourceParam_sourceParamName , _sourceParam.sourceParamType as sourceParam_sourceParamType , _sourceParam.possibleValues as sourceParam_possibleValues , _sourceParam.insertedRowDate as sourceParam_insertedRowDate from sourceParamValue _sourceParamValue join sourceInstance _sourceInstance on _sourceParamValue.sourceInstanceId = _sourceInstance.sourceInstanceId join sourceParam _sourceParam on _sourceParamValue.sourceParamId = _sourceParam.sourceParamId;

select _sourceSchedule.sourceScheduleId, _sourceSchedule.sourceViewId, _sourceSchedule.executorStorageId, _sourceSchedule.insertedRowDate, _sourceSchedule.guid, _sourceSchedule.onDemand, _sourceSchedule.startTime, _sourceSchedule.intervalValue , _executorStorage.executorStorageId as executorStorage_executorStorageId , _executorStorage.executorHostId as executorStorage_executorHostId , _executorStorage.executorStorageTypeId as executorStorage_executorStorageTypeId , _executorStorage.storageDefinition as executorStorage_storageDefinition , _executorStorage.storageBasePath as executorStorage_storageBasePath , _executorStorage.storageFulllPath as executorStorage_storageFulllPath , _executorStorage.isRunning as executorStorage_isRunning , _executorStorage.portNumber as executorStorage_portNumber , _executorStorage.insertedRowDate as executorStorage_insertedRowDate , _executorStorage.guid as executorStorage_guid , _sourceView.sourceViewId as sourceView_sourceViewId , _sourceView.sourceInstanceId as sourceView_sourceInstanceId , _sourceView.sourceViewTypeId as sourceView_sourceViewTypeId , _sourceView.sourceViewName as sourceView_sourceViewName , _sourceView.sourceViewDefinition as sourceView_sourceViewDefinition , _sourceView.insertedRowDate as sourceView_insertedRowDate from sourceSchedule _sourceSchedule join executorStorage _executorStorage on _sourceSchedule.executorStorageId = _executorStorage.executorStorageId join sourceView _sourceView on _sourceSchedule.sourceViewId = _sourceView.sourceViewId;

select _sourceTypeParam.sourceTypeId, _sourceTypeParam.sourceParamId, _sourceTypeParam.isRequired, _sourceTypeParam.insertedRowDate , _sourceParam.sourceParamId as sourceParam_sourceParamId , _sourceParam.sourceParamName as sourceParam_sourceParamName , _sourceParam.sourceParamType as sourceParam_sourceParamType , _sourceParam.possibleValues as sourceParam_possibleValues , _sourceParam.insertedRowDate as sourceParam_insertedRowDate , _sourceType.sourceTypeId as sourceType_sourceTypeId , _sourceType.sourceTypeName as sourceType_sourceTypeName , _sourceType.sourceTypeClass as sourceType_sourceTypeClass , _sourceType.insertedRowDate as sourceType_insertedRowDate from sourceTypeParam _sourceTypeParam join sourceParam _sourceParam on _sourceTypeParam.sourceParamId = _sourceParam.sourceParamId join sourceType _sourceType on _sourceTypeParam.sourceTypeId = _sourceType.sourceTypeId;

select _sourceView.sourceViewId, _sourceView.sourceInstanceId, _sourceView.sourceViewTypeId, _sourceView.sourceViewName, _sourceView.sourceViewDefinition, _sourceView.insertedRowDate , _sourceInstance.sourceInstanceId as sourceInstance_sourceInstanceId , _sourceInstance.sourceTypeId as sourceInstance_sourceTypeId , _sourceInstance.sourceInstanceName as sourceInstance_sourceInstanceName , _sourceInstance.errorCount as sourceInstance_errorCount , _sourceInstance.correctCount as sourceInstance_correctCount , _sourceInstance.lastStatus as sourceInstance_lastStatus , _sourceInstance.lastConnectionDate as sourceInstance_lastConnectionDate , _sourceInstance.insertedRowDate as sourceInstance_insertedRowDate , _sourceViewType.sourceViewTypeId as sourceViewType_sourceViewTypeId , _sourceViewType.sourceViewTypeName as sourceViewType_sourceViewTypeName , _sourceViewType.sourceViewTypeClass as sourceViewType_sourceViewTypeClass , _sourceViewType.insertedRowDate as sourceViewType_insertedRowDate from sourceView _sourceView join sourceInstance _sourceInstance on _sourceView.sourceInstanceId = _sourceInstance.sourceInstanceId join sourceViewType _sourceViewType on _sourceView.sourceViewTypeId = _sourceViewType.sourceViewTypeId;

select _sourceViewColumn.sourceViewColumnId, _sourceViewColumn.sourceViewId, _sourceViewColumn.insertedRowDate, _sourceViewColumn.guid, _sourceViewColumn.columnName, _sourceViewColumn.columnType , _sourceView.sourceViewId as sourceView_sourceViewId , _sourceView.sourceInstanceId as sourceView_sourceInstanceId , _sourceView.sourceViewTypeId as sourceView_sourceViewTypeId , _sourceView.sourceViewName as sourceView_sourceViewName , _sourceView.sourceViewDefinition as sourceView_sourceViewDefinition , _sourceView.insertedRowDate as sourceView_insertedRowDate from sourceViewColumn _sourceViewColumn join sourceView _sourceView on _sourceViewColumn.sourceViewId = _sourceView.sourceViewId;
